page.title: 16THE FAMOUS ALVA BAND
page.content: There has been a{Brass Band}in Alva since about 1880,but the present band was formed in 1910. About 30{musicians now play in the band. They don't all live in Alva,but travel from places like Crieff and Dunfermline because the band is good. All the instruments are very expensive. The Tuba costs Â£3,200,a Trombone costs over Â£1,000. They raise money by coffee mornings,prize draws, public appeals and sponsors. The band plays at{events}like gala days, concerts,services and contests. If a band is 1st or 2nd in the Scottish Championships,it goes to play in London. The Alva band has been 7 times since 1973. John Hudson of{Foden's {band (Preston)}is its new musical director.
